title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Smart Pen-Based Technology-Mediated Language Tutoring Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language knowledge and proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize over 90% of interaction records with tutors using smart pens and digital platforms
Apply five or more explanatory strategies combining graphic notes and audio descriptions when solving composite language tasks (writing/pronunciation/grammar)
Reflect tutoring session records from three or more sessions into analytical assignments through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
